document_data.name: Shazzelim's Retreat
document_data.mainbody: '''Shazzelim's Retreat''' was an inn found in the [[Amn]]ian city of [[Esmeltaran]] during the mid-to-late 14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Location: The inn was built near the center of Esmeltaran.
document_data.Services: Shazzelim's Retreat provided excellent service, especially its food. It was named after the [[scimitar]] mounted over the bar, allegedly ''[[Shazzelim]]'', though it was actually a mundane imitation with a few glamors cast upon it.
